overview: Steve “the Dev” Saporta: Steve was hired to lead and oversee LocalUpâ€™s technology development objectives and to meet company goals and milestones. His first entrepreneurial experience was with Midi, Inc. Starting as Midi’s third employee, he worked on numerous interactive video and e-learning projects, rising to the rank of Chief Technology Officer. After the acquisition of Midi by SAI Global, Steve stayed on in the role of Technology Manager, Americas, overseeing the design, development, hosting and support of web-based applications serving more than one million users. Steve has been a presenter at venues such as The Training Conference and Streaming Media East as well as a guest lecturer at The College of New Jersey. Steve received his degree in Computer Science from Princeton University.
